mapper.insert: insert into ssm_user(name, pass, nick, gender, phone, birthday, address) values(#{name}, #{pass}, #{nick}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{address})
mapper.update: update ssm_user set name = #{name}, nick = #{nick}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, birthday = #{birthday}, address = #{address} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, nick, gender, phone, birthday, address from ssm_user
select id, name, nick, gender, phone, birthday, address from ssm_user where id = #{id}
select id, name, pass, nick, gender, phone, birthday, address from ssm_user where name = #{name}
